title.bibl: Naujienos, Jan. 5, 1915. Kudirka Society Gives New Year Concert

notesStmt.note: Transcribed from digital images contributed to the Internet Archive by the University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign.

div.bibl: Naujienos, Jan. 5, 1915. KUDIRKA SOCIETY GIVES NEW YEAR CONCERT

body.p: p. 4.... The Kudirka Choral Society entertained Chicago Lithuanians on New Year's Eve with a concert at Meldazis Hall. The program consisted of songs, music and monologues. It was a most successful evening and everybody had a good time.
A large crowd attended. The audience was well balanced, because no intoxicating drinks were sold during the program.
At its pre-annual meeting on Dec. 27th, this society donated $25.00 from its treasurery for the relief of war refugees in Lithuania.
